mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products(productno, productname, categoryno, sub_categoryno, product_price, product_Explanation, pddate, pdimagefile1) VALUES (products_seq.nextval, #{productname}, #{categoryno}, #{sub_categoryno}, #{product_price}, #{product_Explanation}, sysdate, #{pdimagefile1})
mapper.select: SELECT productno, productname, categoryno, sub_categoryno, product_price, product_Explanation, pddate, pdimagefile1, r FROM ( SELECT productno, productname, categoryno, sub_categoryno, product_price, product_Explanation, pddate, pdimagefile1, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT productno, productname, categoryno, sub_categoryno, product_price, product_Explanation, pddate, pdimagefile1 FROM products WHERE sub_categoryno = #{sub_categoryno} AND productname LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' ORDER BY sub_categoryno DESC ) )
